TopicTitle: Stay in Jool synchronous orbit or not?

Articles.Content: While trying to send a second ship to orbit jool, i accidentally landed myself into a synchronous orbit. so should keep myself in sync or not?

did you have something else in mind for that ship?....

and more important - does it have any fuel left?

helps to know those things before you decide
I just want it to orbit jool. since landing is not an option. has about 1280L of fuel left
if you care anything about getting the crew back, you could send a rescue mission.... that'd be a nice challenge to pull it off
